text: Eddie Bernice Johnson (December 3, 1935 â€“ December 31, 2023) was an American politician. She was a member of the United States House of Representatives from Texas's 30th congressional district. Johnson was a member of the Democratic Party. Johnson was a member of Alpha Kappa Alpha Sorority, Incorporated and The Links. Johnson died on December 31, 2023 in Dallas, Texas at the age of 88. She had recently been admitted into hospice care. ==References== ==Other websites== * Congresswoman Eddie Bernice Johnson official U.S. House website * Campaign website * * Category:1935 births Category:2023 deaths Category:United States representatives from Texas Category:People from Waco, Texas Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:African-American politicians Category:Members of the Texas Legislature
title: Eddie Bernice Johnson
